title: Interrogation and counsel
brief_description: This film raises for discussion some alternative police interrogation procedures and the rights of the accused to notification of their rights and, if necessary, to effective legal representation. The Fifth and Sixth Amendments to the American Bill of Rights are presented and related to two simulated cases.
